description.value: As long as the Character's Comrade is in Cohesion, enemies gain no bonus for outnumbering them, and they can aso react to Melee Attacks even if Unaware or Suprised.

system.benefit: As long as the Character's Comrade is in Cohesion, enemies gain no bonus for outnumbering them, and they can aso react to Melee Attacks even if Unaware or Suprised.
